CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. WHITE MOUNTAIN APACHE TRIBE.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT C. BRAUCHLI ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:02 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
